nodes.text: Dreadnaught-Two, known as D-Two for short, was the second of six Dreadnaught-class heavy cruisers used on Outbound Flight.
It came directly off of the Rendili StarDrive line for use on the project in 27 BBY.
Feeven lived on Dreadnaught-Two, and Jedi Master Evrios was responsible for the ship's Jedi affairs.
